name: Judgement Day (Carlos L. Hernando)
description:
The Judgement Day Device only has one button: The J Key. If it is not pressed every five seconds, it will release destruction upon the globe.

As the Subject N1438, you are given entire control of this all mighty button. The war and the human race are in your finger.

Featuring 11 endings!

This game has been made for the One Button Jam. Although it is a full working game, I would like to have the time to add some more features:

  • More stories (they would be randomly selected in each run, the system is done)
  • Hacker interruptions
  • Secret functionalities to detect when the player is goofing around and react to that

Maybe in the future.

Credits:

Game Design, Programming and "Art" by Carlos L. Hernando

Audio and Music by Daniel Núñez Martin

For more of their material check Risin' Goat:

Website: www.risingoat.com

Twitter: @RisinGoat

Fonts:

Liquid Crystal by Chase Babb

Manuskript Gothisch by Peter Wiegel
